locale.message: This plugin allows for RSS aggregation to be added to CMS pages
The CMS Plugin must be installed and enabled in order to use this plugin.
Oldest items (in months). 0 for all available items.
Combine the feeds for each page and sort by date

This CMS RSS Plugin enables journal managers to add RSS feeds to the otherwise static pages of the CMS Plugin.

The Page Name must correspond to the heading of the CMS page (which appears in the table of contents). You must separate heading names with a ":". For example: heading1:heading2.

Feed URL's are not validated, so make sure that the URL used here corresponds to the right RSS URL.
Every row requires a page name and a feed URL
Rows are sorted by Page Name
